website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight serum that moisturizes and brightens for younger-looking skin in no time.
pros: Moisturizes and evens out skin tone
cons: Texture is almost watery, which can make it messy to apply

website_summaries.verdict: A top-seller that is made with a high concentration of vitamin C for revitalized skin. Has many loyal customers that call it a must-have part of their daily skincare routines.
pros: Concentrated formula contains 20% vitamin C that is perfect for tackling tough hyperpigmentation
Improves skin's texture and softens fine lines and wrinkles
Scent isn't overpowering, and a little goes a long way
cons: Some reports of receiving already-oxidized product

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty pissed, want my money back
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT OBAGI PROFESSIONAL-C. Ive used obagi C for over 5 years (mostly from different dermatologist offices) and it always stings/tingles just a little bit, makes face a little flush and makes skin feel silky. this does none of that. Its not even the same color. I highly doubt there is any vitamin c in it. Maybe I will do a litmus test,id bet this stuff is very nuetral. I will see if serum discolors over time too. if you let real obagi sit too long, it does turn dark. Save your money. Im a real person, with real experience and this is just oil. I'm pretty pissed, want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: howard sutcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Watered Down
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Obagi Professional C Serum for years. I’ve always purchased it from my dermatologist but when I saw it on Amazon, I thought, how convenient! It was sealed & in the Obagi box but after breaking the seal & opening the bottle, I immediately noticed it was lighter color color & much thinner than what I have purchased in the past. In other words, I think it has been watered down!!! Buyer beware!!! Convenience is not worth it ~ I’ll make the 35 minutes drive to the doctor from this point own. NOT HAPPY & TRULY DISLIKE DISHONESTY!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real deal. It is a clear serum. I normally get it from my doctors office and this is not the same at all.
customer_reviews.author: Martine S.

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT IS YELLOW FROM OXIDATION
customer_reviews.text: I have used Obagi for years and it is normally clear in color. The one that came in the mail was very yellow and I paid full price for it. I might as well buy it directly from Obagi. Do not let anyone tell you that the yellow color is normal. That is false!! Please beware of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Did like the 1rd order was 20%vitamin c serum and the second did not tell me it’s was 20% L-Ascorbic Acid not the same as 20% misleading
customer_reviews.author: sandi

customer_reviews.title: Real or Fake???
customer_reviews.text: I Dont think this is real., it has an odor and is very light in color and texture. Very different from past purchases that I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Arusha

customer_reviews.title: Taking Years Off By Using This Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. It was originally recommended in a Dermatologist Office during a Facial & Treatment. I found out that I could purchase the same product on Amazon at a less expensive price. It keeps my skin clear, removing the dead skin cells and leaves your face clean and pores smaller. It works quickly, I can see a difference in my skin within days. It is an amazing product that I would recommend to anyone. Love the product but not this supplier, no expiration date on product. tag put over skew.
customer_reviews.author: oceangirl

customer_reviews.title: C-serum for the face
customer_reviews.text: Miracle in a bottle! Hands down the best serum I have ever tried, and I have tired many. The best! Makes your face super soft and its immediately absorbed by the skin. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gio Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Reconsider!
customer_reviews.text: I saw Zero results! Most my friends live by Obagi and say great things but this did nothing for me. Looking at other reviews, apparently this is a fake?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Siregar

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle with the dropper cap.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and took it out of the packaging. I replaced the normal cap with the dropper cap. It is so poorly designed that the dropper cap becomes loose no matter how tight you screw it on and the serum leaks all over. I completely wasted 1/4 of the bottle because the cap does not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: KPR

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie once you use this product is going to be must to have in your vanity worth every penny, leaves you skin smooth if you have dry skin it helps you alot
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Is this the real stuff?
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like the same product I purchased directly from the Dermatologist. That was thicker and a golden color. This is watery and clear. Feeling like I was duped.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Water down!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item and disappointed. It appeared to b watered down. It's suppose to b a serum. I have used this product and know what it feels like. Had to return but they don't accept returns. Crap
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this line for 3 years but have always purchased it through my dermatologist. I bought it here to save some money and I broke out into a rash all over my face and had to go to my dermatologist. This could have been expired or mixed with something off brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bottle leaked out all over 😲😣😢
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the product. What I hate is that I took a brand new bottle ( used once before I left on vacation). When I arrived at the first of many destinations, the bottle was nearly empty. Luckily I had it in my quart sized ziplock for flying. When I opened the bag, eve was covered in my expensive serum. The top was still on snugly, but the serum was almost gone. After tightening the top really well, I went on my next flight. When I arrived, the bottle was empty. VERY DISAPPOINTING! I would love to have a replacement bottle sent to me in Florida where I’m staying.
customer_reviews.author: gailservice

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: It is different then the one I buy it from medical spa. It is dark brown. I am asking for return but their policy does not allow to. Still dealing with amazon. Such a headache. Not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd be getting a nice quality serum when I bought this, I figured it would be a step up from the previous vitamin C serum I bought from a less expensive brand.... unfortunately this one was exactly the same, if not worse. I would recommend shopping around for a product like this and saving your money, not worth it at all. The bottle felt cheap and everything about it was low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product!
customer_reviews.text: This is not real Obagi. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: This is a new formualtion from the original 20% and gas inside bottle
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this when it was a combination of L-ascorbic acid and ascorbyl 2-glucoside (AA2G). Ever since they changed it to 20% ascorbic acid, the product seems to contain gas inside and is frothy. Upon first opening the bottlle, air or gas escpaed (making a burping sound) and of course some of the product also burps out of the little bottle and so you have just lost some product. It only happens the first time you open the product. I complaind to Obagi but they seemed like they didnt own the issue and told me to speak to the vendor of the product. New bottle...same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Romano

customer_reviews.title: I store mine in a closet good
customer_reviews.text: I only use this C serum. Start w 15 b4 u get the 20%. I was terrified it would b a fake obagi bc obagi doesn’t sell on line. Seems to b the real deal. Not that it’s a low price. U can find it at doctors office for about the same price now w taxes n shipping added on. Keep it in away from sunlight. I store mine in a closet good luck
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Feak Product
customer_reviews.text: Last August/ 16 /2020 I brought one Profession Serum of OBAGI turn out it feak ( Read). My wife compare it with the same product that I brought 4 months ago. The liquid is darker yellow, it doesn;t smell good, and doesn't work like the other ones. I wold like to refund or resend me other one. I you have any question, please contact anytime . Like you see two bottle are diffrent Thank you Danny Phuong Tran
customer_reviews.author: Phuong Tran

customer_reviews.title: Well worth its price
customer_reviews.text: This is the only vitamin c serum that actually works for me. It's expensive, but worth it. Just make sure you purchase it from a reputable vendor.
customer_reviews.author: iGUANA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for over 8 years and I love it. It's very effective. I love the way it feels on my skin, not greasy. Goes on very smoothly and easily absorbed. Leaves my skin, smooth, bright and helps prevent wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: terre

customer_reviews.title: This is not Obagi, it's knock off. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not Obagi, it's knock off. I have used Obagi for years and it turns a dark yellow after you've had it a while, this product did not turn colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This serum is water down and color is too light. When i apply real Obagi Serum to your face normally you can feel the silkiness in your skin right after. This product my skin feels no different. I think it’s fake! $100. is a lot to pay for a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Keeps skin smooth and supple.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality 20% Vitamin. I use this every morning under moisturizer and swear by it. This is my daytime vitamin C and keeps my aging skin soft and supple. Great sun protection too.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't used this product in a couple years. I realized my pores looked large and my skin wasn't as smooth as in the past. I just started using it again a couple of weeks ago and I'm already seeing improvements. I won't be without it again!
customer_reviews.author: J Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: the old looks good for me
customer_reviews.text: i brought this when the price is around $57 and i brought this now(price around $107). the old looks good for me,the serum is kind of dense compared to new one,i feel like old one worked nice on me.i have been using new one for 15 days.
customer_reviews.author: sandeep pathuri

customer_reviews.title: not obagi product that I get from Obagi
customer_reviews.text: Not the original product poor performance wrong color and no results that I usually get from original obagi products wasted my my money
customer_reviews.author: gwe leger

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to feel and see youthfulness
customer_reviews.text: Best product by far to stimulate collagen in your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hulett

customer_reviews.title: NOT fresh!
customer_reviews.text: This serum wasn't very fresh...it had a yellow tint to it...smelled a little rancid. I decided not to purchase from this seller again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: a little Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery authentic product. I have been using this serum for years and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: louis5

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely improves skin texture
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the Obagi C serum for two years. I am very pleased with the results. My skin tone is more even and I often receive compliments on the smoothness of my skin. I have given it to friends so they may enjoy the benefits as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Small

customer_reviews.title: This is the Best Vitamin "C"
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have used and purchased other Vitamin C products but Obagi definitely makes a good product overall and I would recommend any of their products. My skin looks great after using their vitamin c serium for 6 months now. I would definitely recommend it especially to older women in their 50's and up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best product 3 week using it and wow
customer_reviews.text: The best product 3 week using it and wow !!! Huge difference on my skin . Yes will buy . But why is it 15 dollars more !!!???
customer_reviews.author: lalo

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off. Do not waste your money. It is not an authentic obagi product. Can’t blame China for tricking us with knock offs. Buyer be ware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle serum
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several version of a vitamin C serum and hands down, Obaji is the best! It leaves my skin with a glow that I get compliments on all the time! It's light enough that it doesn't feel greasy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like the one I buy locally
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like the one I buy locally, colour and smell completely different - I believe this is a fake
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I think this means it has gone bad or something
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time and the last bottle I purchased the liquid turned brown. I think this means it has gone bad or something. Usually the liquid is clear. The time for return is over so I am stuck with a product I cannot use. An expensivie one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good prodeuct. I often use it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good prodeuct. I often use it.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I’ve been using for about 4 years ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’ve been using for about 4 years now and love the way it makes my skin look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have used Vit C 20% before to great satisfaction, but never this brand. Not impressed with the results at all! It serves more like a moisturizer rather than a rejuvenator! Not purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: QualitySeeker

customer_reviews.title: Happy so Far
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it a few days ago so I’d say too soon to really judge. I had used Obagi C serum but this is medical grade so I expect better results. So far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hood

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Product
customer_reviews.text: I can truly see a difference in my skin since using this product! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotta

customer_reviews.title: I love the product and having been using it for years
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and having been using it for years!! I have ordered from other sites and this has been the best.
customer_reviews.author: GEANINE PREGEL

customer_reviews.title: Great Serum
customer_reviews.text: I really love this serum so much. I mix it will most all of my night time treatment, including the Retinol Booster I ordered with it. Vitamin C serums are a great additions to any face treatment. I have used this directly on my skin and had no side effect. I would not, however, try that in the day time. One thing to remember is that vitamin c will brighten the skin, so if you are already pretty fair, you might want to blend it with another product. I am not trying to get lighter, but I really like the glow it gives me. And, the looks I get from people are not to bad either :-).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this serum. It doesn’t burn my face and I live how my skin feels
customer_reviews.author: Growing in Christ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: Dislike, felt like the wasn't Any vitamin C at all !!! Barbor 20% much better
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it , it make my skin bright and shine, I’ll keep purchasing it .
customer_reviews.author: Fendi Chen

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Brightens skin and clears trouble spots
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Brightens skin and clears trouble spots!! I typically use it at night. I even feel a slight tightening effect, and when worn under moisturizer during the day, my skin literally glows. It is definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: Smell of product
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very odd scent. Is this normal? Also seems to be very “watery”.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it, wish I could find one cheaper but they never brighten like Obagi
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s fake and made me break out. I took it to my dermatologist who compared it to the real deal. The real one smelled much less like rubbing alcohol. Dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Light consistency on oily problematic skin. This has already faded some hyperpigmentation in the short time I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: sucks

customer_reviews.title: Get younger
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stuff! I Feel it working. Expensive but worth it. This was the best price I could find
customer_reviews.author: Glynis Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife. She is thrilled with the product after only on application.
customer_reviews.author: Jim crain

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Notice a difference is just a few days. Love Love Love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Lo in Florida

customer_reviews.title: great for your skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for ten years, love the results!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle R Booth

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: No no no... not the same as what I bought from the dermatologist ... I should have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: janal biegler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS SERUM ! MY SKIN HAS IMPROV ED GREATLY SINCE I STARTED USING IT.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE SANTOSUSSO

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product that I will continue to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before and like the appearance of my skin tone. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without it. It adds such a glow to my skin that total strangers compliment me every day.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I can see change in my skin after one week of use! I love this serum
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Yellowed serum
customer_reviews.text: I like Obagi products but this one was yellow and not clear. No expiration date was on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: didn't do miracle and it ran out in two weeks. so pricy for just two weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Samorost

customer_reviews.title: Using vitamins c serum for eyes and face
customer_reviews.text: I could see the difference in my face after 3 weeks also my friends and family. My skin has even texture and no more open porse . Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Farah Ghorbani

customer_reviews.title: Go for this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about 10 years since it was recommended by my Dermatologist. I'm 64 now, and my skin is free of sun spots, very few wrinkles and smooth. You only need about 5 drops in your hand, blot your hands together and dab them all over face (special placement around corners of eyes, and around mouth), then pat your hands on neck, chest, then finally on the top of hands and pat up your wrists and arms). It's a little pricey, but significantly lower on Amazon. It lasts nearly 6 months! When you first start using, you'll start to see a difference in a month or two, and then it gets even better!! All true! 🤓🤓
customer_reviews.author: A. Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamin C Serum I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: Obagi product seems more potent than others I've tried and leaves my skin glowing - often people ask what I use on my skin to make it look so good - and I've struggled with acne and super oily skin all my life- this product is a must in my daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: cowgirlsunshine1103

customer_reviews.title: Like a greeting from the outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous fragrance! Takes me on hikes - in my mind - which makes me rally happy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris of Cal

customer_reviews.title: I really like this serum it feels great not oi
customer_reviews.text: I really like this serum it feels great not oi;y, if it helps that is another thing but it feels great
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.  Wear it everyday!  Was told by derm it's most important!
customer_reviews.text: Super product. 5 drops to the clean face every morning. It lasts me a few months. Love the product. Good pricing here rather than derm office.
customer_reviews.author: eli kinsman

customer_reviews.text: This product has a very unusual odor.....can hardly use because of the strange tainted aroma....not worth the money....cannot tell you the results., because very difficult to use because of the scent
customer_reviews.author: Gordoneia

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stuff! very pure. I will wear it all the time. Goes on easily and lasts a long, lpong rime.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product.
customer_reviews.text: I can't see any results form using this product and the smell is horrible. I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for years on Amazon and I think I just got taken. It is not the same color or consistency as what I've been using.
customer_reviews.author: sandra gulisano

product_meta.title: OBAGI PROFESSIONAL-C SERUM 20% 1.0 OZ Pack of 1
product_meta.description:
Highest concentrated serum with 20% L-ascorbic Acid (vitamin C) , best suited for normal to oily skin. Uniquely formulated to help reduce the appearance of skin aging and leave skin feeling silky soft. 

Ingredients: propylene glycol, water, L-ascorbic acid, alcohol, ascorbyl glucoside, ethoxydiglycol, phenoxyethanol, sorbitol, sodium hyaluronate, zinc chloride, calcium hydroxide, fragrance

Experience the benefits of Vitamin C in Obagi Professional-C products. 



BRAND STORY
Experience the benefits of Vitamin C in Obagi Professional-C products.
